name: Total Destruction (Onixath)
description:
Total Destruction is mad for the GPTJam and i was only allowed to make all scripts with the ChatGPT Ai. 

Game: 

You are a normal worker at a company but your computer braeks down. You cant controll yourself and your goal is destroy everything.  But other workers called the police, so you have just a minute to destroy as much as you can.
